Text: This should be a pleasure. Thank you.
btw - Most of the screenshots in this torrent and in many of your others have been deleted by imageshack. Thanks again for the gems you upload here.

I finally completed this download.

What can I say?  It's just all kinds of awesome.  It is disc 1 in a 3 disc set, and it's so worth the time if you're into silent cinema.  

Just superb in every way.  Thanks for the upload.  I will continue sharing (however, my upload speed is severely limited by my ISP.)

Thanks a million.
